reviews.text: We had shutters installed last summer in part of our house. Tom told us when he measured that we will love them so much we will want the rest of the windows done. He was absolutely right and we just completed our second install for the rest of our windows earlier this week. To say I am pleased is an understatement. They are gorgeous and so well made. Both of our installer teams were amazing, kind and professional. Our home has been completely transformed and I would encourage anyone thinking abo

We had an excellent experience with texas Shutters & Blinds starting at their store in Frisco. The owner came to our home with fabric samples from which we found just what we wanted to replace 22 years old pull up shades. We selected the roll up shades and love how easily they go up and down. The measurements were perfect so that there is no light peeping through on the sides. The installer was in and out quickly taking the old shades with him.
Job well done and a good experience.

Best company to work with.
Ladies at front desk to technicians and installers everyone is very nice and sincere.
We are so happy with our plantation shutters.House looks so beautiful.

Hire them without any hesitation.The whole team is amazing and will take care of you.Best price and they will not haggle on small things with you.

Repeat customer for life.

Tripan Ghuman

I’m so excited about my wide shutters with hidden tilt!!! My new home looks amazing with our pottery barn/Charleston style shutters. Thank you Texas Shutters for the impeccable quality! The ladies in the office have been so kind and Tom the owner actually is who measured and won the bid due to his fair pricing and educating me on shutters vs blinds. Buy your shutters from Texas Shutters in Frisco
Thank you

Texas Shutters & Blinds

My husband and I had custom shutters made for our garage windows. They measured our windows and gave us a free quote… within 90 days, our shutters were installed, perfectly!  We are very please with the quality of the material and work performed!

We definitely recommend using Texas Shutters & Blinds to anyone that is looking to have shutters for their home and motorized screens for their patios (which we’re planning to do soon)! They are number 1 in my book. 😁

It was a pleasure working with Texas Shutters and Blinds. They sent me a quote quickly when I originally sent some measurements I did myself. The team was easy to communicate with and also delivered the best quote among those who responded to my request. When the owner Tom came for an in home consultation, he measured the windows quickly, got right to the point, and was in and out. I always dread getting quotes for the endless small talk and high pressure sales, but this was the opposite of that

We have used this company for all of our home window coverings, as well as for our business. They are the very best & so lovely to work with. Their prices are very competitive & they stand behind their products & work. I recommend them highly & have done so in the past with family & friends.

Very happy with the level of service and the product! Fairly priced and fast turnaround around times! Install was fast and they took care to clean up after as well! We love all our new blinds and shutters!

Texas Shutters made and installed shutters in our first Texas home. When we moved, we called them and ordered shutters a second time. When we needed additional shutters, we called Texas Shutters. Professionally constructed and installed every time.

Great customer service in addition to providing his customers with realistic pricing and he stands by the products he sells.   Tommy Wilson has owned the business for over 20 years.  He services residential homes as well as commercial business's.  Tommy or one of his other experienced team members will come to your home or business and work with you in order to get the results you want.  He or one of his installers will respect your home and or business and will not leave a mess.  Tommy was born

I recently moved into a home that had shutters.  In the master bedroom, there were 3 transom windows without shutters.  I called Texas Shutters & Blinds.  They came out and determined that they could match the ones previously installed.  Measurements were taken and when they returned to install them, they worked quickly and did a very good job.  The color and style matched perfectly!  I was  very pleased with the finished product.  I would recommend this company to anyone considering having shut

We already had plantation shutters in most of the rooms in our house, which we purchased from a different company several years ago. We recently ordered additional shutters from Texas Shutters and Blinds for the three remaining rooms in our house, and we couldn’t be more pleased. The new shutters are so much more sturdy and seem to be a much better quality. The price was comparable to the other shutters that were purchased several years ago. Tom from Texas Shutters and Blinds was very profession
We could not be more pleased with the skylight shutters that Tom installed for us. They work and look beautiful!

This is the second project I've done with Texas Shutters and Blinds.  Once again, I was more than satisfied with the quality of the work and installation of my shutters.  When I saw how nice the new shutters looked, I wondered why I waited so long to complete the placement of shutters on my windows.  The price was reasonable and the turn around time was quicker than I expected.  I would absolutely recommend TSandB.

Recommended by many happy neighbors that’s used TSB. They were easy to work with, had great communication and quick turnaround and install. My shutters are exactly what I wanted and beautiful. Highly recommend this company!
We’ve had Texas Shutters and Blinds out twice to install shutters in several rooms of our home. They are beautiful and we absolutely love them!

I & a family member have used Texas Blinds & Shutters multiple times for shutters.  We have always been happy with the quote, recommendation for style, & install.  I highly recommend this company of integrity & supporting local business.
Professional service and high quality shutters.  No complaints with the entire process from selection to installation.  Highly recommend.
Love Texas Shutters and Blinds! Our plantation shutters throughout our house are gorgeous! Such an easy process from the beginning to the end product!! Thank you!

We enjoyed the sales process in getting shutters for our home.  In all we purchased 16 shutters.  The shutter quality and performance has been good so far.  The install team was great to work with.  Lead time was long, though.  In our case 12 weeks.  I'm giving 4 stars due to a couple of issues on the order that TSAB eventually made right.  On install, we found that one window had been completely missed on the build order even though it was on the DocuSign invoice and was paid for.  TSAB pushed

Their shutters are absolutely beautiful.  The attention to detail is like none other. Totally worth the wait! I would not go anywhere else, start to finish impeccable service! Quality is the best! Order yours today! You will be happy!

Pleasant, professional and everything they said with time frames,home visit and installation was correct and precise.  All personell polite,friendly and knew exactly what they were doing. Could not be more pleased. And the results are beautiful.

Had to wait a long time for our shutters to arrive due to Covid 19 and shipping delays.  Nevertheless, once they did arrive, the shutters were exactly what we ordered and look beautiful.  The installation crew was fantastic and efficiently installed them.  Throughout the process, Texas shutters was sympathetic to the delays, which was not their fault, and tried to keep us posted throughout the process.  We are very happy with Texas Shutters and highly recommend them to others.
We just got 13 shutters installed by them and I’m very happy with the finished product! The quote process was easy and the install was quick and efficient! Highly recommend!

I love my shades from Texas Shutters & Blinds. The whole process was very easy and Robert was very knowledgeable, friendly and great problem solver. My shades came in two weeks from the initial consultation and the install was great with no issues. I highly recommend Texas Shutters & Blinds for all your window fashion needs.

Texas Shutters & Blinds is awsome. Their professionalism is top notch. I am extremely pleased with Texas Shutters & Blinds, from the beginning to the end. Both of my roller shades and shutters arrived before estimated date of arrival, and I couldn’t not be any happier with the products. Both the color and material were perfect match and beautifully made.  Robert was excellent during the installation. He was a perfectionist and made sure I was happy and please with every detail. Highly recommend

Working with Texas Shutters and Blinds was a pleasurable experience. Once I approved the estimate my order was placed and delivery and installation occurred within 3 weeks. I ordered custom shutters and shades that let up and down via remote. I am very happy with both products! I definitely recommend Texas Shutters and Blinds!

We are delighted with our roller shades from TS&B! We moved into our new home this past January & obtained 2 estimates for window coverings before we made our choice. Both carried the same products, but the other company was almost twice as high on their estimate & offered fewer features. We couldn’t be happier with our choice & the customer service is unmatched! The owner, Tom, has come out twice to adjust things that we probably caused & couldn’t be nicer about it. I rarely recommend anyone, b

Texas Shutters & Blinds is my go to when it comes to blinds and window arch coverings.  They are fast, affordable and provide a quality product with great service.  Tom and his team take the time to get everything right.  They are on time, take precise measurements and professionally install their products.  I’ve used them twice and wouldn’t hesitate to use them again.  Thanks TS&B!
Custom made shutters in the Dallas area, not in China!  Beautiful and functional. Nice workmanship. Customer service, sales and installation was top notch.

They are a very legitimate company, and we were able to get some work done on time. Unfortunately, we couldn't complete the project together due to issues with our internal processing system. However, I would still highly recommend them to anyone

Absolutely top notch service from Texas Shutters & Blinds.  Tom and Betty were fantastic to work with, and the finished installed plantation shutters are amazing.  The fit and finish are absolutely perfect, and the installers were professional and cleaned up after themselves.

I went into the location about 10 days ago to get a quote on replacing 4 sets of blinds that were broken.  I wanted to give a local company the money instead of purchasing online.

The minute I walked in it was negative energy.  The 3 ladies in the office made assumptions about what I wanted.  After a few minutes of pushing through the negativity they realized they COULD do what I was asking and took all of my info for a quote.  They told me I would receive the quote in two days and I have yet t

I've used Texas Shutters & Blinds on two new homes now, and I have to say they're the best at what they do. If you live around Plano, Frisco, Prosper, or McKinney, you're a fool to use anyone else.

The shutter technology they use is state of the art, and the sales team and installers are professional and friendly.

I got the 2.5 inch faux wood white blinds with no holes in them (a new way of doing them-- hole-less), and they look super modern with no string holes for people to peep through.

Th

Tom came out in late January to work up an estimate which I accepted a few days later. Because of the pandemic and the housing boom manufacturing of blinds was and probably still is a slow process. I was hoping to have the blinds installed prior to my move in date of April 2, but it wasn't until April 8 before that happened. But what a difference they made in the overall appearance and atmosphere of my new home. The blinds are perfect and everything I hoped they would be. I had envisioned instal

Robert came to install our blinds and did an incredible job. He was very thorough, friendly and walked me through all the features of our new blinds. Such a positive experience and the blinds look amazing!
Our plantation shutters are beautiful.  We love them.  They have updated and changed the look of our entire house.  Love them.  EXCELLENT quality and perfect installation.

We worked with TSB about 18 months ago. The salesperson Tom was helpful and professional, but the rest of the experience was a nightmare.

The installer they sent out didn’t know what he was doing and made multiple return trips to fix problems (like shades that wouldn’t retract) or things he’d forgotten to bring with him (like his ladder). Sometimes he said he would be back and never showed up. It was almost comical. To his credit, Tom came back after all this and fixed what he could.

Fast forw
They did a great job with blind installation at a reasonable price.

Working with Texas Shutters and Blinds was a great experience.  The quoting process was great and the installer was professional.

We would certainly use them again.

0 stars- still waiting for them to finish our patio screens from a month ago. They do not come on time (or at all). They do not return phone calls and are unreliable. They can’t measure and bring an 8 get ladder when they need scaffolding.
Our blinds turned out wonderful! Love them!!
Very easy to work with. They did a great job. Fast and easy install. Fair price. I would use them again.
Texas Shutter and Blinds did a great job on our house. They were professional, budget friendly and easy to work with!
Quality products and service. The blackout skylight blinds have saved us hundred of dollars per year in electricity.
Great job by a great company.  Very professional and installation was very done by two of the nicest guys.  Would buy again and have recommended them.
Best price and and great customer service.  Measured correctly and installation was a breeze.  Highly recommended.
I have had the pleasure of working with Danny and he’s definitely an all star! Professional, knowledgeable, and a total craftsman!
Tom and Robert did a great job installing our blinds, very professional and pleasant....thanks Texas Shutters and Blinds, well done !
Timely turn around and great service, reasonable pricing. Would definitely recommend to others.
